column4: Hey i got a question about screen, I run Xming and connect to my ubuntu box over ssh, now when I open programs they will open up on my windows box, is there any way that I can rig it so they would open on the ubuntu box?
You could just ssh in, and set up the DISPLAY variable, and the 'xhost' command to allow it.. and they would display on the remote..
X has some security features taht you may have to 'work around' :)
